00014 LibraryRefGenerator::LibraryRefGenerator(const QString title,
00015                 QWidget* parent, bool enableCheckBox): QGroupBox(parent),
00016                 vendorEdit_(0), libraryEdit_(0), nameEdit_(0), versionEdit_(0),
00017                 enableCheckBox_(0) {
00018 
00019         setTitle(title);
00020 
00021         // set up the layout for the widget
00022         QGridLayout* layout = new QGridLayout(this);
00023 
00024         QLabel* vendorLabel = new QLabel(tr("Vendor:"), this);
00025         layout->addWidget(vendorLabel, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00026 
00027         vendorEdit_ = new QLineEdit(this);
00028         vendorEdit_->setDisabled(true);
00029         layout->addWidget(vendorEdit_, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00030 
00031         QLabel* libraryLabel = new QLabel(tr("Library:"), this);
00032         layout->addWidget(libraryLabel, 1, 0, 1, 1);
00033 
00034         libraryEdit_ = new QLineEdit(this);
00035         libraryEdit_->setDisabled(true);
00036         layout->addWidget(libraryEdit_, 1, 1, 1, 1);
00037 
00038         QLabel* nameLabel = new QLabel(tr("Name:"), this);
00039         layout->addWidget(nameLabel, 2, 0, 1, 1);
00040 
00041         nameEdit_ = new QLineEdit(this);
00042         nameEdit_->setDisabled(true);
00043         layout->addWidget(nameEdit_, 2, 1, 1, 1);
00044 
00045         QLabel* versionLabel = new QLabel(tr("Version:"), this);
00046         layout->addWidget(versionLabel, 3, 0, 1, 1);
00047 
00048         versionEdit_ = new QLineEdit(this);
00049         versionEdit_->setDisabled(true);
00050         layout->addWidget(versionEdit_, 3, 1, 1, 1);
00051 
00052         // TODO the browsing must be added so user can select from existing busDefs
00053         QPushButton* browseButton = new QPushButton(tr("browse..."), this);
00054         layout->addWidget(browseButton, 4, 0, 1, 1);
00055 
00056         // if enableCheckBox was wanted to be constructed
00057         if (enableCheckBox) {
00058                 enableCheckBox_ = new QCheckBox(tr("enabled"), this);
00059                 layout->addWidget(enableCheckBox_, 4, 1, 1, 1);
00060 
00061                 connect(enableCheckBox_, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)),
00062                         this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00063         }
00064 
00065         connect(enableCheckBox_, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)),
00066                         vendorEdit_, SLOT(setEnabled(bool)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00067         connect(enableCheckBox_, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)),
00068                         libraryEdit_, SLOT(setEnabled(bool)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00069         connect(enableCheckBox_, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)),
00070                         nameEdit_, SLOT(setEnabled(bool)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00071         connect(enableCheckBox_, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)),
00072                         versionEdit_, SLOT(setEnabled(bool)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00073 
00074         // connect the signals used to inform of changes in the widget
00075         connect(vendorEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00076                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00077         connect(libraryEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00078                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00079         connect(nameEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00080                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00081         connect(versionEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00082                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00083 }

00089 bool LibraryRefGenerator::isEnabled() const {
00090 
00091         // if enableCheckBox was constructed
00092         if (enableCheckBox_) {
00093                 return enableCheckBox_->isChecked();
00094         }
00095         return true;
00096 }
00097 
00098 VLNV* LibraryRefGenerator::getVLNV(VLNV::IPXactType type) {
00099 
00100         // if the text-fields are not valid
00101         if (!isValid()) {
00102                 return 0;
00103         }
00104         // if the generator is disabled
00105         else if (!isEnabled()) {
00106                 return 0;
00107         }
00108 
00109         return new VLNV(type,
00110                         vendorEdit_->text(),
00111                         libraryEdit_->text(),
00112                         nameEdit_->text(),
00113                         versionEdit_->text());
00114 }
00115 
00116 bool LibraryRefGenerator::isValid() {
00117         // if this is not enabled then the contents of the text-fields does not
00118         // matter
00119         if (!isEnabled()) {
00120                 return true;
00121         }
00122 
00123         // all elements must contains text
00124         else if (vendorEdit_->text().isEmpty()) {
00125                 QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("Invalid field"), tr("Vendor-field in "
00126                                 "%1 element can not be empty").arg(title()));
00127                 return false;
00128         }
00129         else if (libraryEdit_->text().isEmpty()) {
00130                 QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("Invalid field"), tr("Library-field in "
00131                                 "%1 element can not be empty").arg(title()));
00132                 return false;
00133         }
00134         else if (nameEdit_->text().isEmpty()) {
00135                 QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("Invalid field"), tr("Name-field in "
00136                                 "%1 element can not be empty").arg(title()));
00137                 return false;
00138         }
00139         else if (versionEdit_->text().isEmpty()) {
00140                 QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("Invalid field"), tr("Version-field in "
00141                                 "%1 element can not be empty").arg(title()));
00142                 return false;
00143                 return false;
00144         }
00145         else {
00146                 return true;
00147         }
00148 }
00149 
00150 void LibraryRefGenerator::setVLNV(const VLNV* vlnv) {
00151 
00152         if (!vlnv) {
00153                 return;
00154         }
00155 
00156         vendorEdit_->setText(vlnv->getVendor());
00157         libraryEdit_->setText(vlnv->getLibrary());
00158         nameEdit_->setText(vlnv->getName());
00159         versionEdit_->setText(vlnv->getVersion());
00160         setEnabled(true);
00161 
00162         // if enableCheckBox was constructed
00163         if (enableCheckBox_) {
00164                 enableCheckBox_->setChecked(true);
00165         }
00166 }
00167 
00168 void LibraryRefGenerator::setVLNV( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00169         setVLNV(&vlnv);
00170 }
